Además se dedica a vender lencería y cosméticos por catalogo. En ambos negocios le va muy bien.
Su mercadería la compra en la comuna de Lampa y Santiago Centro.
Con el crédito comprará mercadería para abastecer su negocio, específicamente fideos, azúcar, te, arroz y huevos, al por mayor.
Una de sus metas es ampliar la infraestructura de su negocio, así abastecerlo con mayor cantidad de mercadería.
María Teresa vive junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 4 y 2 años de edad. Su sueño es lograr una independencia económica.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la ayuda brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio.
El grupo del Banco comunal del cual forma parte es muy comprometido y responsable.
Respecto a las capacitaciones comenta que le han servido para organizar la contabilidad de su negocio.
Colina es una comuna de la región metropolitana (donde está Santiago, capital de Chile) ubicada al norte de la misma. Actualmente es centro de importantes inversiones, principalmente en el área agro industrial, debido a la instalación de grandes e importantes empresas, que de paso entregan un gran número de empleos a la comunidad. Es también un área de parcelaciones de agrado, lo que ha contribuido a aumentar considerablemente el número de habitantes. También cuenta con espacios adecuados al turismo, tales como termas, deporte en la Laguna Piedra Roja y montañismo.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called "Los Girasoles."  It is made up of 18 entrepreneurs in the community of Colina who work in different areas, among which are hairdressing, new clothing sales, used clothing sales, and preparation of fast food and natural juices.

María Teresa is the president of the communal bank.  In the photo she is seated in the first row, the third from the right; her hair is dark brown and pulled back, and she is wearing a purple t-shirt and black pants.  She has looked after her business selling groceries, vegetables, and pet food for a year, after having closed it for a time to raise one of her children.  She also works selling lingerie and cosmetics from a catalogue.  It is going well for her in both businesses.  She buys her merchandise in the town of Lampa and in downtown Santiago.

With the loan she will buy merchandise to supply her store, specifically noodles, sugar, tea, rice, and eggs wholesale.  One of her goals is to expand the infrastructure of her business, thus supplying it with a greater quantity of merchandise.

María Teresa lives with her husband and two children, ages 4 and 2.  Her dream is to achieve financial independence.

She is very happy and grateful for the help offered by Fondo Esperanza because it will allow her to invest in her business.  The communal bank group of which she is a member is very supportive and responsible.  Regarding the training, she comments that they have served her to organize the accounting in her business.

Colina is a community in the metropolitan region (where the capital of Chile, Santiago, is located), in the north of the region.  Currently it is the center of important investments, principally in the agroindustrial area, because of the presence of large and important companies that in turn give a large number of employees to the community.  It is also an area of pleasant sub-divisions, which has contributed to expanding considerably the number of residents.  There are also areas suitable for tourism, such as hot springs, sports in Lake Piedra Roja, and mountain climbing.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to supply her business, specifically noodles, sugar, tea, rice, and eggs wholesale.

loans.name: Norabel

texts.en: Norabel is 40 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has four children. Norabel has a retail shop where she sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 15,000 PHP to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages. Norabel has been a member of HSPFI since 2007. In the future, Norabel hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages for resale

loans.name: Carlos Luis

texts.es:
Carlos Luis es un joven de 21 años de edad, el cual vive con su familia, en la comunidad de Canalette, en la región de Upala, San Carlos en la provincia de Alajuela. Esta provincia ocupa el primer lugar nacional en la producción de café y azúcar de caña. Produce además granos básicos (arroz, frijoles, maíz), frutas, legumbres, tubérculos y hortalizas, una de las principales zonas ganaderas del país especialmente a través de la producción del cantón de San Carlos. Además en la provincia se asientan las plantas procesadoras de leche de la Cooperativa de Productores de Leche Dos Pinos, propiedad de miles de productores de leche. 
Además en la zona alrededor de la ciudad de Alajuela se ha asentado gran cantidad de empresas manufactureras de exportación. En Alajuela operan las zonas francas de El Coyol, Saret, Montecillos y Bet. 

Desde hace varios días atrás Carlos Luis está necesitando una mayor inversión, para satisfacer las necesidades de su familia y para continuar su negocio, le hace falta lo principal para que su negocio surja y para que los vecinos de su comunidad se vean beneficiados.  El proyecto le es algo poco común e interesante.

Actualmente Carlos Luis está solicitando un micro crédito de ¢600.000 (seiscientos mil colones) para  compra y venta de camisetas serigrafiadas. Con esto el espera hacer crecer su negocio, ya que su meta es poder continuar con su trabajo donde pueda mejorar tanto su calidad de vida como la de su hogar. 

Carlos Luis es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Canalette, una de las 150 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Este será su cuarto préstamo y con él espera continuar creciendo a nivel personal y económico además de participar activamente en la organización de crédito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Carlos Luis is a young man of 21 years of age. He lives with his family in the community of Canalette, in the region of Upala, San Carlos, in the province of Alajuela. This province is the biggest producer in the country of coffee and cane sugar. It also produces staple crops (rice, beans, corn), fruit, vegetables, root vegetables, and greens, and it is one of the main livestock areas of the country, especially the canton of San Carlos. The province is also the home of the milk processing plans of the milk producing cooperative Leche Dos Pinos, which belongs to thousands of milk producers. What is more, in the area around the city of Alajuela, many businesses that manufacture for export have opened-up. Alajuela operates free trade zones in El Coyol, Saret, Montecillos, and Bet. 
Since some time back, Carlos Luis has needed greater investment to meet the needs of his family and continue his business. He needs capital so that his business can thrive and the residents of his community can benefit. His project is unusual and interesting. 
Currently, Carlos Luis is requesting a micro loan of $1,200 to buy and sell silkscreened t-shirts. He hopes that this will make his business grow as his goal is to be able to continue with his work and so to improve his quality of life and his home. 
Carlos Luis is a member of the community bank Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Canalette, one of the 150 member organizations of EDESA in Costa Rica. This will be his fourth loan and he hopes it will help him to grow personally and economically and to participate actively in the community bank.

loans.use: to buy and sell silkscreened t-shirts.

loans.name: Hudoyberdi

texts.ru: Худойьерди отец пятерых детей.Три сына помогают ему в дехканском хозяйстве, они выращивают арахис. При каждой обработке, прополке и поливе земли занимаются его сыновья. А сам Худойберди опытный животновод, любитель крупно рогатого скота.Сейчас у него две дойные коровы с телятами и десять баранов. На закуп корма и пары коров он решил получить кредит.Худойберди по профессии ветеринар, поэтому при малейшей болезни скота он готов применить нужные инъекции для их выздоровления.
texts.en:
Hudoyberdi is the father of five children.  Three of his sons help him with the work on the farm where they grow peanuts.  His sons always take part in cultivating, weeding, and irrigating.  

Hudoyberdi is an experienced stockbreeder and he loves large cattle.  Now he has two milch cows, their calves, and ten sheep.  He has decided to take out a loan to buy two cows and feed.  

By profession Hudoyberdi is a veterinarian and he can give the necessary injection for even the most minor disease.

loans.use: to buy two cows and feed

loans.name: Vanna

texts.en: Vanna, 29, is widowed and resides with two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in raising pigs to sell for more than two years, earning approximately 4 USD per day. In order to improve her family's living conditions, Vanna is requesting a loan of 300 USD to purchase piglets to breed and sell for a profitable price when they gain weight. By doing so, she will be able to generate more profit to support her family. In the future, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it much stronger and to provide a better living environment for her family. She also wants to support her children in their studies until they get Bachelor's degrees.

loans.use: to purchase piglets

loans.name: Las Margaritas 2 Group

texts.es:
Eulalia cuenta con 32 años de edad es casada tiene 7 hijos los cuales algunos están estudiando Alexis esta en 2° de preparatoria, Joel esta en 3° de secundaria, Magali en 3° de secundaria, Jonathan 1° de secundaria, Larissa en 5° de primaria, Dayanna tiene 2 años y Jaret 3 años su esposo se llama Galdino.

Ella es comerciante tiene un taqueria que atiende junto con su esposo su taqueria esta establecida frente ala cancha de pueblo lugar donde la gente suele salir a pasear ya tiene 6 años con el negocio ella dice que le va muy bien pues lo sabido sacar adelante junto son su esposo, ella invertirá su préstamo en los insumos que utiliza para los tacos como son: carne, aceites, verduras, tortillas, etc. Espera hacer crecer su negocio.

Eulalia pertenece al grupo las margaritas 2 el cual esta integrado por 12 personas las cuales todas son mujeres a continuación serán mencionadas:  Magally, Isabel, Abelina, Floricel, lazara, Herminia, Divina, Mónica, Ignacia, Marcela, Maria de los Ángeles, todas realizan una actividad comercial como son: venta de dulces, perfumes, comida, ropa, frutas, fríjol, pollos, tacos, verduras, etc.
texts.en:
Eulalia is 32 years old and married. She has seven children, some of whom are in school: Alexis is in her second year of preparatory school, Joel is in his third year of secondary school, Magali is in her third year of secondary school, Jonathan is his first year of secondary school, Larissa is in her fifth year of primary school, Dayanna is two years old, and Jaret is three years old. Her husband is named Galdino.

Eulalia is a merchant who has a “taqueria” that she manages with her husband. Her business is located in front of the town square where people pass by. Eulalia has been in business for six years and says that she has done very well because she has been able to move forward with her husband. She will invest her loan in supplies for making tacos such as meat, oil, vegetables, tortillas, and other items. Eulalia hopes to grow her business.

She is a member of the group “Las Margaritas 2”, which consists of 12 individuals, all of whom are women. They are as follows: Magally, Isabel, Abelina, Floricel, Lazara, Herminia, Divina, Mónica, Ignacia, Marcela, and Maria de los Ángeles. All of them engage in commercial activities such as selling candy, perfumes, food, clothing, fruit, beans, chickens, tacos, vegetables, and other products.

loans.use: to buy  meat, oil, vegetables, tortillas, and other items.

loans.name: Minda

texts.en:
Minda is 53 years-old and lives in the Philippines. She is widowed with three children. 

Minda has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for 12 years. She requested a loan for 16,000 in order to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Minda has been a member of Kiva partner HSPFI since 2009.  In the future, Minda hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Las Juanix Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama  las  Juanix  esta v conformado por diez  mujeres trabajadoras que les gusta salir adelante y esposarse para lograr sus sueños y así ofrecerle una mejor vida a sus familias.
Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la señora  Gloria una señora trabajadora, humilde de  cincuenta y siete años de  edad.
Doña Gloria se dedica a  la venta de refrescos y comida como es: tacos dorados y barbacoa de pollo y de res.
También nos cuenta que se dedica a la siembra de plátanos  para la venta por menudeo.
Esta felizmente casada con el señor  José un señor trabajador que se dedica a la albañilería y a trabajo de campo como es: siembra de maíz y de plátanos.
Tiene la cantidad de seis hijos: Elias, Heli, Isidra, Verónica, Jose Luís y Uvaldo.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de  más refrescos para la venta  por mayoreo y menudeo.
Doña Gloria nos cuenta que lo que mas le gusta de su negocio  es darles una buena atención a sus clientes.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son: 
Verenice- se dedica a la venta de  comida.
Agustina- se dedica a la venta de pollos.
Angelina- se dedica a la venta de pollos.
Edith- se dedica a la venta de  perfumes.
Adelfa- se dedica a la venta de pan.
Bertina-se  dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Vanessa – se dedica a la venta de refrescos.
Anatolia - se dedica a la venta de comida.
Juana- se dedica a la venta de  comida.
Les  dan las gracias a fundacion realidad por darles la oportunidad de hacer crecer sus negocios y así tener los medios para ayudar a sus familias.
texts.en:
This group is called “Las Juanix” and consists of 10 hardworking women who enjoy moving forward and taking hold of their dreams so that they can offer a better life for their families.

One of them members of this group is Sra. Gloria, a 57-year-old woman who is hardworking and humble. Doña Gloria sells soft drinks and food such as golden tacos, roasted chicken, and beef. In addition, she says that she grow bananas for sale. She is happily married to Sr. José, a hardworking gentleman who is a bricklayer. He also works in the fields growing corn and bananas. Gloria has six children: Elias, Heli, Isidra, Verónica, Jose Luís, and Uvaldo. She is requesting a loan to buy more soft drinks to sell wholesale and at retail. Gloria says that what she enjoys most about her business is providing good service to her customers.

The other group members are as follows: • Verenice sells food. • Agustina sell chickens. • Angelina sells chickens. • Edith sells perfumes. • Adelfa sells bread. • Bertina sells Mexcian street food. • Vanessa sells soft drinks. • Anatolia sells food. • Juana sells food.

They thank Fundación Realidad for giving them the opportunity to grow their businesses so that they will have the means to help their families.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en:
Esterlita is 51 years-old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 10 children. 

Esterlita has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 15,000 in order to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Esterlita has been a member of Kiva partner HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Esterlita hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Mamadou Saliou

texts.fr: Monsieur Mamadou   vit au Sénégal. C’est un homme marié, soutien de  famille, père de 2 enfants de 2 et 5 ans, il aussi en charge  une parente  qui vit sous son toit.  Il s’active dans le secteur du commerce car il est boutiquier  depuis 2002. Après l’accident de travail dont il a été victime dans l’usine de fabrique de briques ou il était employé il s’est orienté vers le commerce.  C’est une activité qu’il aime beaucoup  et qui lui permet de subvenir a ses besoins. Il est membre d’un guichet   de l’U-IMCEC de la localité ou il habite depuis 10 ans. il a déja remboursé 4 crédits antérieurs. Il sollicite un crédit de 300 000 frs prévu  pour l’achat de nouveaux  produits alimentaires qui seront destinés a renforcer le stock de sa boutique. Ce financement lui permettra de maintenir le niveau de ses activités et continuer avec ses bénéfices a  gérer les dépenses quotidiennes de la maison.
texts.en: Mr. Mamadou lives in Senegal. He is married and has a family to support: two children, two and five years old, as well as an additional relative living with him. He is active in commerce and has kept a store since 2002. After becoming the victim of a work accident at the brick factory where he worked, he went into commerce. This is work that he likes very much and that permits him to make a living. He has been a member of his local U-IMCEC branch for 10 years. He has already repaid four prior loans. He is seeking a credit of 300,000 francs intended  for buying additional groceries and expanding his stock. This financing will allow him to maintain his sales level and continue to provide for everyday household expenses thanks to his revenues.

loans.use: to buy groceries for resale

loans.name: Bougouma

texts.fr: Mademoiselle  Bougouma est âgée  de 28 ans et vit au Sénégal. Elle s’active depuis 12 ans dans le commerce et la vente de prêts à porter et de produits cosmétiques.  Elle a très tôt  abandonné l’école et c’est aussitôt  après que sa maman l’a initié au commerce. Elle  est sociétaire de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC  depuis 3 mois. Elle sollicite un crédit de 300 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de prêts  a porter et de cosmétiques destinés a renouveler son stock. L’accroissement de ses bénéfices lui permettra  de financer une activité de vente de chaussures et tissus.
texts.en: Mademoiselle Bougouma is 28 years old and lives in Sénégal. She has been active for 12 years in shopkeeping and the sale of ready-to-wear clothing and cosmetics. She left school very early and immediately her mother introduced her to shopkeeping. She has been a member of one of the branches of the UIMCEC for 3 months. She is requesting a loan of 300,000 frs intended for the purchase of ready-to-wear clothing and cosmetics to renew her stock. The growth in her profits will allow her to finance a business selling shoes and fabric.

loans.use: to buy ready-to-wear clothing and cosmetics to resell.

loans.name: Ana Guadalupe

texts.es: Ana Guadalupe de treinta años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y su hijo en casa  propia. Ella posee un chalet en una escuela cercana a la localidad donde vive, vende bebidas, comida rápida, golosinas entre otros, todos los del centro escolar son sus clientes, pues la prefieren porque vende productos de primera calidad, a precios accesibles además su servicio es inigualable, ella es muy amable con todos; Ana es una mujer dedicada a su trabajo muy activa y siempre dispuesta a aprovechar las oportunidades que se le presentan, piensa que cada día es una oportunidad de invertir en la vida, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar  bebidas, golosinas, pan, embutidos, etc. Ana Guadalupe tiene fe que así podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Ana Guadalupe, age 30, lives in her own home with her life partner and her son. She manages a convenience store at a school near the town where she lives. Ana sells beverages, fast food, candy, and other products. Everyone at the school are her customers. They prefer to buy from her because she sells products of high quality at affordable prices. In addition, her service is unequalled. Ana is very friendly with everyone. She is a woman who is dedicated to her business, active, and always willing to take advantage of opportunities that are presented to her. Ana believes each day of her life is an opportunity to invest.

For this reason, she is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral so that she can buy beverages, candy, bread, sausages, and other items. Ana Guadalupe has faith that she can provide financial security to her home and a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy beverages, candy, bread, sausages, and other items.

loans.name: Cenobia

texts.es:
La señora Cenobia es una señora trabajadora de cuarenta y dos años de edad, se dedica a la venta de  mercancía de abarrotes como es: javon, café, ceral, leche, pan, galletas, sabritas, refrescos y verduras.
Ella nos cuenta que lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es atender bien a sus clientes y ayudarle ando les da  fiado cuando no tienen dinero ya que en el trascurso de la semana se los pagan.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de más mercancía como es: leche, yogurt, agua, sabritas, jugos, paletas, galletas y azúcar.
Le da las gracias a fundacion por ayudarla a lograr sus sueños.
texts.en:
Sra. Cenobia is a hardworking 40 year-old woman who sells groceries such as soap, coffee, cereal, milk, bread, cookies, Sabritas [brand name for chips], soft drinks and vegetables.

She tells us that what she most enjoys about her work is providing good service to her customers and helping them by giving them credit when they have no money so that they can pay her later during the week.

She requested a loan to buy more merchandise such as milk yogurt, water, Sabritas, juices, popsickles, cookies and sugar.

She thanks the Fundación for helping her realize her dreams.

loans.use: to buy groceries for sale.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en: Yolanda is from Taguitic, Kapatagan, Lanao Del Norte. She is 36 years-old and married with five school-aged children. To make a living, Yolanda has a retail store selling daily use and home products. She has been engaged in her business for 24 years and earns 3,000 PHP a month for these activities. In 2010, Yolanda joined Kiva partner GDMPC in order to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Yolanda is requesting a loan of 7,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Abdoul Aziz

texts.fr: Monsieur Abdoul Aziz est un sénégalais de 32 ans .Il est marié et père de 2 enfants de 2 et 3ans. Il évolue dans le monde de la couture depuis 24 ans. C’est une activité qu’il a choisi sur la recommandation de son marabout. Il est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEc depuis  7 ans. Il sollicite un crédit de 250 000 frs prévu pour l’achat d’une machine a coudre cornière.Ce financement pourra l’aider a éviter de confier ses service de broderie  a d’autres tailleurs ce qui rendra son activité plus rentable pour lui.
texts.en: Abdoul Aziz is a 32 year old Senegalese. He is married and father to 2 children who are 2 and 3 years old. He has been evolving in the world of sewing for 24 years. This is a business that he chose based on the recommendation of his marabout [type of African witch doctor]. He has been a member of one of the branches of the UIMCEC for 7 years. He is requesting a loan of 250,000 frs intended for the purchase of an angle iron sewing machine. This financing will be able to help him avoid entrusting his embroidery services to other tailors which will make his business more profitable for him.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for the needs of his business.

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is from Inasagan, Aurora Zamboanga Del Sur. She is 36 years-old. Merlyn is married and has three school-aged children. 

To make a living, Merlyn is operating a business selling soft drinks in the local community. Merlyn is now two years in this business. In 2008, Merlyn joined Kiva partner GDMPC in order to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Merlyn is requesting a new loan of 10,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Rosalba

texts.es:
La señora Rosalba  tiene veinte seis años de edad es madre soltera tiene una hija, se dedica a ala vende de perfumes de  diferentes marcas como es: fraiche, avon y chantal.
Tambien se dedica a la venta de mercancia de barrotes  por menudeo.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de más perfumes para la venta, ella nos cuenta que le gusta mucho su negocio por que le deja buenas ganancias.
Le da las gracias a fundacion por el apoyo que le ha dado para ofrecerle un mejor futuro a su hijo.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosalba is 26 and a single mother with a daughter. She sells different brands of perfume such as Fraiche, Avon, and Chantal. She also sells groceries retail.

She requested a loan in order to buy more perfume to sell. She tells us that she greatly enjoys her business because it provides her with a good income.

She thanks the Fundación for the support it has given her so that she can provide a better future for her child.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes to sell.

loans.name: Combé

texts.fr: Madame Combé  est une femme mariée de 57 ans. Elle évolue dans le commerce de produits locaux (citron) et de légumes. Elle a choisi cette activité pour gagner de l’argent et aider sa famille. Ce qui lui plait le plus dans son activité ce sont les échanges qu’elle fait avec ses clients et la satisfaction qu’elle leur procure. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC de la banlieue depuis aout 2004.Elle a déjà remboursé 2 prêts  antérieurs. Elle sollicite un crédit de 200 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de légumes et de jus de citron destinés à la vente. Ce financement lui permettra de développer son activité de commerce, d’accroitre l’argent qu’elle gagne et d’améliorer sa situation sociale ainsi que celle de sa famille.
texts.en:
Madam Combé is a 57 year old married woman. She is progressing in trading local products (lemons) and vegetables. She chose this business to make money and help her family. What pleases her the most in her business are the trades that she makes with her clients and the satisfaction that she provides them. 

She has been a member of one of the branches of the UIMCEC of the suburb since August 2004. She has already repaid two previous loans. She is requesting a loan of 200,000 frs intended for the purchase of vegetables and lemon juice destined for sale. This financing will allow her to develop her business, to grow the money she makes and to improve her social situation as well as her family's.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and lemon juice to resell.

loans.name: Rossana

texts.es:
La señorita  Rossana  tiene veinte cuatro años de edad, se dedica a ala vende de perfumes de  diferentes marcas como es: fraiche, avon y chantal.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de más perfumes para la venta, ella nos cuenta que le gusta mucho su negocio por que le deja buenas ganancias.
También se dedica a la venta de  material de papelería por mayoreo y menudeo.
Le da las gracias a fundacion por el apoyo que le ha dado para  obtener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rossana is 24 years old and sells different brands of perfume such as Fraiche, Avon and Chantal.

She requested a loan to purchase more perfume for sale. She notes that she greatly enjoys her business because it provides her with a good income.

She also sells stationary items, both wholesale and retail.

She thanks the Fundación for the help it has provided her in obtaining a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase perfume to sell.

loans.name: Aurea

texts.es:
La señora Aurea  tiene  cuarenta y cuatro años de edad se dedica a la venta de refrescos por mayoreo y menudeo.
Ella nos cuenta que le gusta mucho su negocio por que le deja buenas ganancias  y maneja su tiempo.
Tambien se dedica a la venta de dulces como son. paletas,pulpas y chiclecks.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de más refrescos para la venta  ya que en ocasiones vende  mucho por mayoreo y no le alcanzan los refrescos.
texts.en:
Sra. Aurea is 44 years old and sells soft drinks, both wholesale and retail.

She tells us that she greatly enjoys her business because it provides a good income and it manages her time.

She also sells sweets such as lollypops, fruit pulps and gum. She requested the loan to purchase more soft drinks to sell since she occasionally sells wholesale and does not have enough soft drinks left.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Isidra

texts.es:
La señora Isidra  tiene  treinta y nueve años de edad, es madre soltera tiene una hija pero gracias a dios a podido salir adelante con su hija.
Ella se dedica a la venta de dulces desde hace tres años, nos cuenta que le gusta mucho su negocio por que le deja buenas ganancias y no descuida la educación de su hija.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de más dulces  para la venta.
texts.en:
Isidra is 39 years old.  She is a single mother who has a daughter, but thank goodness she has been able to move ahead with her daughter.
She has been selling sweets for three years.  She tells us that she likes her business a lot because it provides good earnings for her, and she doesn't have to worry about her daughter's education.
She asked for the loan to buy more sweets to sell.

loans.use: buy sweets to sell.

loans.name: Vilma  Flor

texts.es:
La señora  señorita Vilma es una persona trabajadora se dedica a la venta de plásticos como son: cuvetas, jarafones, platos, bandejas y tambos.
Ella nos cuenta que le gusta mucho su negocio por que maneja su tiempo y su dinero y su negocio le deja buenas ganancias.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de más plásticos para la venta por mayoreo y menudeo.
Le da las gracias a fundacion por ayudarla  a alcanzar sus sueños.
texts.en:
Vilma is a hardworking person who sells plastics such as: buckets, faces, dishes, trays, and bins.
She tells us that she likes her business a lot because she manages her time and her money, and her business provides her with good earnings.
She asked for the loan to buy more plastics to sell wholesale and retail.
She gives thanks to the foundation for helping her to reach her dreams.

loans.use: buy plastics to sell.

loans.name: Jessica Belén

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Unión y Trabajo se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.

En este lugar vive la señora Jessica, tiene 20 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene una hija de 1 año y seis meses. El marido es guardia de seguridad.
 
Ella es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de productos de Avon (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja tres días a la semana de dos a tres horas al día, ella tiene que llevar a su pequeña hija cuando realiza sus ventas ya que no tiene donde dejarla lo cual es un poco incomodo pero que aun así tiene que hacerlo ya que a su esposo no le alcanza para todos los gastos,  deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene más de tres años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien, lo que más vende son los cosméticos ya que según dice son muy buenos.

Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y bisutería. Este es el sexto ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los pagos son fáciles de hacer.
 
Sus sueños son seguir adelante en su negocio y mejorar su vida.

En la foto está la socia con su hija.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Unión y Trabajo" meets every 15 days in the city of Manta.  This is a city that is known for beautiful beaches that attract visitors in every season of the year; it's a city with unparalleled beauty and many tourist attractions.

Jessica, 20, lives here in a common-law marriage which has produced a daughter who is a year and a half.  Her husband is a security guard.

Jessica is a housewife who, in order to obtain her own resources and help her husband with the household expenses, has a business selling Avon products.  Avon products include beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and accessories for women.  She works 3 days a week for 2 to 3 hours per day.  She has to take her small daughter with her when she goes out to make her sales, since she doesn't have anyone she could leave her with.  This is a bit uncomfortable, but she must do it, because her husband's earnings are not sufficient to cover all of the family's expenses.  She sells her products on credit and collects every 8 days.  She has had this business for more than 3 years now, and it is going very well for her.  What she sells the most are cosmetics, since she says that they are very good products.

This loan will be used to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics and accessories.  This is the 6th loan cycle for this communal bank, and she likes it because the payments on the loans are easy to make.

Her dreams are to continue to make progress with her business and to improve her life.

In this photograph, she is the member with a daughter.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics and accessories

loans.name: Otilia

texts.es:
La señora Otilia es una señora trabajadora  que se dedica a  la venta de calzados como  son: zapatillas, tenis, zapatos y huaraches.
Ella nos cuenta que le gusta mucho su negocio por que le deja buenas ganancias  y  así puede mejorar su calidad de vida.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de más calzado para la venta.
Le da las gracias a fundacion por ayudarla a salir adelante y cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en:
Sra. Otilia is a hardworking woman who sells footwear such as slippers, tennis shoes, regular shoes and huaraches.

She tells us that she greatly enjoys her business because it provides her with a good income and therefore she can improve her quality of life.

She requested the loan to buy more footwear to sell.

She thanks the Fundación for helping her to get ahead and realize her dreams.

loans.use: to purchase footwear to sell..

loans.name: Atalani

texts.en:
Atalani is 49 years old and is married with four children.

Atalani owns and operates a business venture, planting and harvesting taro for sale.  She has three years of experience in this business.  Atalani needs a loan of WST 1,500 to purchase harvesting equipment such as wheelbarrows, shovels, rakes, baskets, and knives.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 450 talas or US$188 per week) to improve and expand the business.

Atalani joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Atalani's second loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase harvesting equipment such as wheelbarrows, shovels, rakes, baskets, and knives

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva is from Margos, Kapatagan, Lanao Del Norte. She is 29 years old and married with five children. To make a living, Eva owns and operates a business venture in the services sector, operating a tricycle transport service. She has two years of experience in this business and earns 3,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) a month. 

In 2011, Eva joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. She is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to repair a transport vehicle used in the business. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle used in the business.

loans.name: Eusebio

texts.es:
El señor Eusebio esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar material de trabajo ya que le hicieron un pedido y no cuenta con el material, adecuado para llevar acabo dicho proyecto por lo cual solicita nuestra ayuda para poder comprar fierro, soldadura y así empezar a elaborar los trabajos que le solicitaron.
La esposa del señor Eusebio con los ingresos que gana de su trabajo en una fabrica; le ayuda con una parte de los gastos de la casa y con los estudios de sus tres hijos. 
Don Eusebio desea mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y crecer más su negocio.
texts.en:
Eusebio is requesting a loan so that he can buy materials for his work, since he has an order but lacks the materials he needs to fulfill the order.   For this reason, he is requesting a loan to buy iron and welding materials.  This way, he can start to make the products that have been ordered.

Eusebio's wife helps with some of the household expenses and the educational expenses of their children with earnings she gets from working in a factory.  

Eusebio wants to improve his family's quality of life and make his business grow.

loans.use: to buy materials for his metalworking business

loans.name: Piula

texts.en:
Piula is 35 years of age and is married with three children.

Piula owns and operates a business venture selling beef products in the local community.  She has four years of experience in this business. Piula needs a loan of 2,250 talas (WST) to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 400 talas or US $167 per week) to pay for her children's tuition fees.

Piula joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral.  This is Piula's fourth loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale.

loans.name: Emelyn

texts.en:
Emelyn is 36 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children. 

Emelyn has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 20,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Emelyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2010. In the future, Emelyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Marichu

texts.en:
Marichu is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. 

Marichu has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 21,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Marichu has been a member of HSPFI since 2010. In the future, Marichu hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Oscar Giovanny

texts.es:
Oscar, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 12 y 5 años de edad, es empleado de la compañia claro desde hace un año, su horario de trabajo es de 8:00.am a 5:00pm de lunes a sábado.
El préstamo lo necesita para la reparación de su vehículo como cambiarle llantas, y otros arreglos, de esa forma podrá tener el vehículo en buenas condiciones para trasportarse a su trabajo.
El sueño de Oscar es siempre mantener su trabajo con el cual mantiene a su familia y trabajar bien con nuestra institución
texts.en:
Oscar lives wuth his wife and their two children, ages 12 and 5. He has been working for the telephone company for a year. His hours of work are from 8:00am to 5:00pm from Monday to Saturday.

He needs the loan for repairing his vehicle; changing tires, and other repairs. That way, he will be able to have a vehicle in good condition for getting to work. Oscar's dream is to always keep his job, by which he supports his family, and to work well with our institution.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for his vehicle.

loans.name: Feiloaiga

texts.en:
Feiloaiga is 68 years of age and is married with one child.

Feiloaiga owns and operates a business venture, selling lavalavas (bottom-half wrap-around prints worn by both men and women).  She has one year of experience in this business. Feiloaiga needs a loan of 1,000 tala (WST) to purchase additional fabrics and materials. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 400 talas or US $167 per week) to improve/expand the business.

In 2012, Feiloaiga joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Feiloaiga's first loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional fabrics and materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients to make food.

loans.name: Crisanta

texts.en: Crisanta is from Baclay, Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur. She is 39 years old, married and has 2 children. Crisanta owns and operates a specialized retail store, selling daily use products such as shampoo, soap, and toothpaste in the local community. Crisanta has been in this business for 2 years and earns 2,500 PHP. In 2008, Crisanta joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Crisanta is requesting a new loan of 5,000 PHP which will be used to purchase new items to expand product offerings. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's general living conditions

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand product offerings

loans.name: Virgilia

texts.en:
Virgilia is 50 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 1 child. 
Virgilia has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 17,000 to buy stock of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Virgilia has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Virgilia hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages for sale

loans.name: Loreto

texts.en:
Loreto is 24 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is single. 
Loreto has a shop that sells clothing, perfumes, colognes & beauty products from AVON, BOARDWALK, SPLASH & RED LOGO. He has had this business for 2 years. He requested a loan for 20,000 to buy stock from AVON, BOARDWALK, SPLASH & RED LOGO for sale.
Loreto has been a member of HSPFI for since 2011.  In the future, Loreto hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy stock from AVON, BOARDWALK, SPLASH & RED LOGO for sale

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is 43 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 2 children. 
Wilma has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 18,000 to buy stock of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Wilma has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Wilma hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages for sale

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José, es empleado, vive con su esposa y su hijo, vive cerca de sus padres y hermanos, él trabaja en una casa de préstamos, desde hace 6 años, por ser una persona responsable ha logrado mantener en el empleo y ayudar a su familia en las necesidades básicas. Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de una motocicleta para su trabajo, con este préstamo completara el valor de dicho medio de transporte que le permitirá movilizarse y realizar con mayor rapidez sus actividades.  
El sueño de José es mejorar su vida, la de sus hijos y sus padres, también la de su esposa, por eso se esfuerza por ir mejorando su condición de vida dentro del buen desarrollo del trabajo.
texts.en:
José is employed, and lives with his wife and child. He lives close to his parents and siblings.  He has been working at a loan agency for six years, Because he is a responsible person, he has managed to keep his job, and provide his family with the basic necessities. 

At this time, he is applying for the loan in order to buy a motorcycle for his work. With this loan he will be able to cover the purchase cost of this means of transport, that will allow him to get around, and carry out his work more quickly. 

José's dream is to improve his life, that of his children, his parents, and also that of his wife. That's why he does his best to gradually improve his living conditions, in carrying out his work well.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle for his work.

loans.name: Rustamjon

texts.ru: Рустамчон проживает в городе Исфара. Ему 29 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он занимается торговлей фруктов. Этим видом деятельности он занимается шесть лет. Кредит берет для закупа дыни и арбузов.
texts.en: Rustamjon lives in the town of Isfhara. He is 29 years. He is married, with two children. His wife is a homemaker. Rustamjon sells fruits. He has been in this business for six years. He is taking out a loan to buy melons and watermelons.

loans.use: to buy melons and watermelons

loans.name: Wilson

texts.es:
Wilson de 33 años, es un hombre trabajador que da servicios de pinturas y acabados en diferentes casas. Desde que el era pequeño realizaba trabajos de asistente de pintura poco a poco compro herramientas para sus servicios como pintador. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones en conseguir más clientes para poderles ofrecer el acabado y dar el servicio de pintura en sus casas. 

Trabaja de lunes a sábado en diferentes casas. Tiene  muchas aspiraciones en seguir trabajando por eso desea el préstamo para comprar pinturas, soldaduras, latas para darle a sus clientes un mejor servicio.
texts.en:
Wilson, 33, is a hard-working man who provides painting and finishing services for houses. He started working as a painter's assistant when he was young and little by little, he bought the tools needed to offer his own painting service. 

He has aspirations of gaining more customers to offer finishing and house-painting to. 

Wilson works from Monday to Saturday on all different houses. He has strong motivation to keep working, so he would like a loan to buy paint, welding materials, and cans in order to provide his customers with better service.

loans.use: to buy paint, welding materials, and cans

loans.name: Israel Antonio

texts.es:
Israel, vive con su esposa y su hija, el se dedica a vender lubricantes para automóviles, el oficio lo aprendió de un familiar, trabaja todos los días de 6:00 am a 6:00 pm de lunes a domingo.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar lubricantes para automóviles diesel y gasolina y lo demás lo ocupara para invertirlo en arreglo de su automóvil de esa forma su negocio estará estable.
El sueño de Israel mejorar cada día sus ganancias, tener variedad de lubricantes y con el tiempo tener un negocio más grande para vivir feliz con su familia.
texts.en: Israel lives with his wife and daughter and sells automotive lubricants, the trade he learned from the family.  He works every day from 6:00 am to 6:00 pm Monday through Sunday.  The loan will be used to buy lubricants for petrol and diesel cars and the rest to invest in fixing his car so that his business will be stable.  Israel’s dream every day is to improve his profits, have a variety of lubricants, and eventually have a larger business to live happily with his family.

loans.use: to buy lubricants for gas and diesel cars.

loans.name: Nelsis Argentina

texts.es:
Doña Nelsis tiene 42 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive en el barrio en Jardin, ahi vive con sus 4 hijos. Nelsis se dedica a la de venta de golosinas y refrescos, durante la epoca escolar tiene una glorieta ubicada en un colegio de la zona, sus clientes son los estudiantes y maestros. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de los alimentos para preparar sus deliciosas golosinas. 
La meta de Nelsis es hacer crecer su negocio y tener mayores ventas para obtener mas ganancias, las cuales necesita para salir adelante con sus hijos.
nos comento que se siente feliz ya que sus hijos son saludables y que todo le esta saliendo bien con su negocio.
texts.en:
Nelsis 42-year-old single mother and lives in the neighborhood of Jardin with her 4 children. She sells snacks and soft drinks during school hours and has a food stall located in a local school. Her customers are students and teachers. 

This loan will be used to purchase ingredients to prepare her delicious treats. Nelsis' goal is to expand her business and achieve higher sales to increase her profits, which she needs to raise her children and get ahead in life. 

She says that she is happy because her children are healthy and that everything is going well with her business.

loans.use: to purchase meat, tortillas, vegetables, seasonings, bread, soft drinks, rice, beans, butter, salsa, disposable cups and plates, gas.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan is from Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is 36 years old and is married. Susan used her last loan to buy seeds and seedlings. Her gardening business is now successful. Recently, she requested a loan to purchase additional seeds & seedlings to raise. Susan hopes to double her profit.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds & seedlings

loans.name: Jhonnyz Enrique

texts.es: Jhonnyz tiene mucha experiencia de vida, quedó huérfano de padre y madre y desde muy temprano aprendió a valerse de manera autónoma, por eso aprendió a ser independiente y desde el año 2002 emprendió un negocio mediante el cual ofrece  los servicios de barbería, peluquería en la línea de caballeros y corte de cabellos en los niños. Su negocio está ubicado en un local de la parte delantera de su casa, de un barrio al sur de la ciudad, que combina espacios productivos formales e informales, viviendas, conjuntos, residenciales, grandes superficies comerciales y uno de los escenarios mas importantes para la práctica profesional del futbol de Colombia, donde juega el equipo Junior de Barranquilla, equipo amado por la costa Caribe de Colombia. En su negocio más que un corte de cabello,  Jonnyz  ofrece a su clientela, durante 10 horas diarias y hasta mas si es necesario, servicios de mejoramiento de su imagen, ellos son principalmente, sus  amigos, vecinos y el público en general. Aunque la competencia se torna muy alta, se sostiene por la calidad con que practica su trabajo, precios cómodos  y satisfacción total de su clientela. Los estados financieros de este negocio muestran una infraestructura física pequeña, sus indicadores expresan un capital de trabajo y un índice de liquidez característico de este tipo de negocios, la inversión principal está en sus activos fijos, lo que genera la solvencia a este tipo de negocios.  Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, y tiene el objetivo principal de comprar productos de peluquería, como champús, bálsamos, cremas de afeitar y otros similares, al por mayor y de contado, para mejorar su servicio de corte de cabello y arreglo de bigotes y barba y disminuír el precio de ventas haciendo sus compras de contado y en mayor volumen, las que le otorgan descuentos. También planea reparar la silla de peluquería que muestra en su fotografia, comprar herramientas varias, como tijeras, cuchillas, barberas, etc., y mejorar la fachada del negocio, pintando sus paredes, realizando reparaciones menores en sus pisos, entre otros arreglos.  Su sueño es lograr un verdadero ambiente confortable para sus clientes y para el mismo trabajar muy comodamente.
texts.en:
Jhonnys has a lot of life experience, he grew up an orphan and from early on he learned to fend for himself.  He became independent and from 2002 he started his own barbershop business, specializing in men and young kids.  His business is located in front of his home located in a neighborhood south of the city which is a mixup of formal and informal businesses, projects, residential areas, large commercial centers, and one of the biggest stages for professional soccer in Columbia where Junior Barranquilla plays; a team adored by the coastal caribbean of Columbia.  More than just a haircut, Jonnys offers his clients for 10 hours a day and sometimes more, self-improvement services that his friends, neighbors, and the general public take advantage of.
Even though competition is high, he sustains by the quality he provides, his low prices, and complete customer satisfaction.  Financial statements demonstrate characteristics of small business: primary investments are on fixed assets which creates liquidity for these types of businesses.  This is his first loan through Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo, and his objective is to purchase barbershop goods in bulk and in cash in order to reduce costs and purchase products such as: shampoos, balms, shaving creams, and other things in order to improve his barbershop business.

He also plans to fix his chair which is shown in the picture, purchase various tools such as: scissors, blades, trim heads, etc., and to improve the looks of the business by paintings walls and performing minor repairs on the floors amongst others things. His dream is to achieve a comfortable environment for his customers and a comfortable working environment for himself.

loans.use: to purchase barbershop goods in bulk and more: to repair the barshop chair, to purchase various tools such as: scissors, blades, fittings, and to improve the look of the building by doing some painting.

loans.name: Jean Aida

texts.en: Jean Aida, a 56-year-old woman, is married with 3 children. She is a resident of Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. Jean Aida used her last loan to pay for preparing her land for farming. Her business has grown and become successful. Now she is taking a new loan to purchase fertilizer such as manure. She hopes to be able to grow her business further.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Emilyn

texts.en:
Emilyn is 37 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is separated with 2 children. 
Emilyn has a shop on the sidewalk that sells vegetables like eggplants & gasoline by the liter. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan of 17,000 to buy vegetables & a gallon of gasoline to sell.
Emilyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Emilyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy vegetables & a gallon of gasoline for sell

loans.name: Juanita

texts.es:
La señora Juanita solicita el crédito para comprar ropa nueva y ampliar su negocio, ya que necesita surtir de ropa de verano, porque sus clientes le están solicitando este tipo de ropa y no cuenta con el capital necesario para la inversión.
Doña Juanita aparte de ingreso de su negocio, tiene un empleo en una fábrica de noche y en el día se encarga de atender su negocio, con estos dos ingresos a salidos adelante con sus dos hijos ya que es divorciada y tiene la responsabilidad de darles el estudio necesario a su familia y un mejor futuro. 
Desea invertir en su negocio y así tener más variedad de mercancía para ofrecerles a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Juanita has applied for this loan to invest in new clothes and to expand your business. She needs a supply of summer clothes, as her customers are requesting this type of clothing and she does not have the necessary capital for this investment.

Juanita earns a second income besides her clothes business - she has a job in a factory at night, and during the day she runs her business. With these two incomes she raises her two sons, and as she is divorced she is responsible for giving them the necessary education and a better future.

She wants to invest in her business and have a wider variety of merchandise to offer her customers.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of summer clothes for her clothing business.

loans.name: Ursula

texts.en:
This is Ursula, 46, a resident of Caloocan City, Philippines. She is married to Arnel, a driver. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. She works hard to continually provide for their everyday expenses.  

Ursula maintains a direct selling business. She sells clothing, footwear, undergarments, cosmetics and other products through the popular direct selling brands like Avon, Fuller life, Natasha, Boardwalk and Marikina Shoe Exchange. A customer's order is bought in cash by the dealer and then given to the customer on one-month-to-pay credit terms. Dealer’s prices are lower than those in the catalogue, and this profit is the dealer's income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 2000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every week.

To help her continue business operations, she is requesting a Php29,000 loan. She will use the loan to buy merchandise and orders for her customers. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands.  

Ursula hopes to grow her business in the coming years. She faithfully meets with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for merchandise and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is 32 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 3 children. 
Emma has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan of 17,000 to buy stock for her store.
Emma has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Emma hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Touba

texts.fr: Monsieur Touba habite dans une des banlieues sénégalaises. Il est marié  et père de deux enfants de cinq et onze ans. Il pratique une double activité de chaudronnier et de commerçant  depuis 2002.Il est chaudronnier  par vocation mais il a  choisi l’activité de commerce par nécessité  et fait   en meme temps la sérigraphie. Il  est membre du guichet de l’U-IMCEC de sa zone d’habitation depuis 4 mois. Il sollicite un crédit de 400 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de machine et de matériels  de travail. Il  a l’intention de renouveler ses équipements.il souhaite maximiser ses revenus jusqu'à parvenir a  autofinancer lui-même ses activités.
texts.en: Mr. Touba lives in a Senegalese suburb. He is a married father of two children aged 5 and 11. He has worked as both a boilermaker and a merchant since 2002. He is a boilermaker by profession but decided to enter into commerce through necessity, and also does some silkscreen printing at the same time. He has been a member of the local branch of U-IMCEC in his area for four months. He is seeking a loan of 400,000 Frs destined for the purchase of machines and materials for work. His intention is to replace his equipment. He hopes to maximize his income to the point of being able to self-finance his activities.

loans.use: To invest in and buy work materials.

loans.name: Begg Cheikh Moustapha Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe begg cheikh Moustapha a été créé le 21 septembre 2010 jour de l’Assemblée Générale du BV. IL est composé de 07 femmes issues du même village qui sont unies par affinité et par liens de voisinage. 

Mame Diarra est responsable du groupement, elle est âgée de 37 ans et à en charge 01 enfant et 02 autres enfants de son mari. 

Elle a pour activité principale le petit commerce de pagne, draps de lit et colliers qu'elle achète dans d'autre marchés de la localité et revendre au marché de son village. Elle pratique cette activité depuis longtemps. 

Son prêt lui permettra de s'approvisionner en marchandises ci-dessus pour développer son activité et satisfaire sa clientèle. 

Son objectif est de renforcer son commerce et son épargne, appuyer aussi son mari dans besoins de la famille.
texts.en: The Begg Cheikh Moustapha group was created on September 21, 2010, on the day of the "Banc Villageois" General Assembly.  It consists of 7 women from the same village, who share strong bonds as friends and neighbors.  Diarra is the facilitator of the group.  She is 37 years old and supports a total of 3 children, 2 of whom being her husband's children.  Her main activity is to sell pagnes (colorful West African fabrics), bedsheets and necklaces, which she buys at local markets and resells at the market of her own village.  She has been involved in this business for a long time.  Her loan will allow her to stock up on the merchandise mentioned above, in order to expand her activity and satisfy her customers.  Her goal is to strengthen her business and savings, and to help her husband provide for the family.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Abdukarim

texts.ru: Абдукарим проживает в районе Вахш. Ему 49 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Его старший сын уехал в Российскую Федерацию. Сам Абдукарим зарабатывает путем разведения скота. Он берет кредит для закупа несколько голов крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Abdukarim lives in the region of Vakhsh. He is 49 years old. He has three children. His oldest son went to the Russian Federation. Abdukarim is making a living by breeding cattle. He is taking out the loan to buy several heads of large horned cattle.

loans.use: to purchase several heads of cattle.

loans.name: Abou

texts.fr: Monsieur Abou est âgé de 34 ans.  Il est célibataire et exerce l’activité de tailleur depuis 12 ans.  C’est son frère qui lui a fait aimer le métier de tailleur ce qui justifie son  choix  pour  cette activité. Ce qui lui plait le plus ce sont les connaissances, le  gout aux contacts et les chiffres d’affaires importants qu’il réalise.  Il est  membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis 5 ans. Il a déjà remboursé 5 prêts antérieurs. Il sollicite un crédit de 200 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de tissus  lins  qui seront utilisés pour  confectionner des prêts  a porter qu’il va commercialiser. La valorisation de ses bénéfices lui permettra de mieux faire face à ses obligations familiales.
texts.en: Mr. Abou is 34 years old. He is unmarried and has worked as a tailor for 12 years. His brother was responsible for his interest in the tailoring profession, which is why he chose to pursue it. What pleases him most is the ability to form relationships with his customers and learn about their tastes, as well as the significant income he realizes. He has been a member of one of the local branches of U-IMCEC for five years. He has already repaid five previous loans. He is seeking a loan of 200,000 Frs to buy linen, which will be used to make ready-to-wear clothing that he is going to sell. The increase in his profits will allow him to better meet his familial obligations.

loans.use: To buy fabric to make and sell clothing.

loans.name: Sokhna

texts.fr: Madame Sokhna est une femme mariée qui habite au Sénégal. Elle est mère de 2 enfants de 3mois et 3 ans. Elle s’active depuis 10 ans dans le secteur du commerce et vend des perruques  et des produits de traitement pour cheveux. En meme temps  elle fait la coiffure. Ce sont des  activités qu’elle a chois i par amour. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEc depuis octobre 2010. Elle a déjà remboursé un crédit antérieur. Elle sollicite un crédit de 150 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de produits de traitements de cheveux et d’autres nouveaux articles qu’elle va revendre a ses  clients. Ce financement l lui permettra de maintenir sa clientèle en renouvelant son stock  d’articles.
texts.en: Ms. Sokhna is a married woman living in Senegal. She is the mother of two children who are three months and three years old respectively. She has been active in the commercial sector for ten years and sells wigs and hair treatment products. She also is a hairstylist. These are activities she chose because she loves doing them. She has been a member of one of the local branches of U-IMCEC since October 2010. She has already repaid one previous loan. She is seeking a loan of 150,000 Frs to buy hair treatment products and other new items that she is going to sell to her customers. This loan will allow her to maintain her clientele by replenishing her stock of merchandise.

loans.use: To buy hair treatment products and various other items for resale.

loans.name: Daba

texts.fr: Mademoiselle Daba est âgée  de 33ans et vit au Sénégal. Elle s’active dans le commerce et la vente d’habits pour enfants, et  de produits cosmétiques depuis 4 ans. Elle a choisi son activité par nécessité dans le but de se procurer des revenus  et de se prendre en charge. C’est le chiffre d’affaire qu’elle réalise et les contacts avec les gens qui l’intéressent  le plus dans son activité. Elle est membre d’un guichet de l’U-IMCEC depuis 2 mois. Elle sollicite un crédit de 150 000 frs prévu pour l’achat d’habits et de cosmétiques à revendre. L’augmentation de ses bénéfices lui permettra de renforcer ses activités et d’intégrer la vente de produits alimentaires.
texts.en: Miss Daba is 33 years old and lives in Senegal. She has run a business selling children's clothing and cosmetics for four years. She chose this activity through necessity with the goal of earning an income and providing for herself. The sales she makes and the contacts she forms with people are what interest her most in her business. She has been a member of a local branch of U-IMCEC for two months. She is seeking a loan of 150,000 Frs to buy clothing and cosmetics for resale. The increase in her profits will allow her to strengthen her activities and add the sale of food products to her business.

loans.use: To buy children's clothing and cosmetics for resale.

loans.name: Bakary

texts.fr: Monsieur Bakary vit au Sénégal. Il est âgé de 42 ans. Il est marié et père d’un enfant  âgé d’un an. Il pratique l’activité de tailleur depuis 20 ans. C’est une activité qu’il a choisi par passion car c’était  le seul métier qui lui plaisait dans le passé. Ce qui l’intéresse  le plus dans l’activité c’est l’émergence  de cette profession et les relations  et les contacts qui s’y découlent. Il est membre de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis 3 ans. Il sollicite un crédit de 125 000 frs prévu pour la confection de prêts  a porter  hommes et femmes qu’il va revendre. L’augmentation de ses bénéfices avec ce financement aura un impact positif sur sa vie professionnelle et familiale.
texts.en: Mr. Bakary lives in Senegal. He is 42 years old. He is a married father of one child, who is one year old. He has worked as a tailor for 20 years. He chose this line of work because of his passion for it, since it was the only profession that pleased him in the past. What interests him most in this activity is the emergence of the profession and the relationships and contacts that result from it. He has been a member of a local branch of U-IMCEC for three years. He is seeking a loan of 125,000 Frs. to make men's and women's ready-to-wear clothing that he is going to sell. The increase in his profits with this loan will have a positive impact on his professional and family life.

loans.use: To make ready-to-wear clothing for sale.

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr: Madame Fatou  est une jeune femme mariée de 31 ans. Elle vit au Sénégal. Elle est mère  d’un enfant de 5 ans. Elle s’adonne au commerce  et a  la vente de sacs depuis 2 ans. Elle a choisi cette activité par nécessité et dans le souci de combattre l’oisiveté. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis 2 ans. Elle sollicite un crédit de 100 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de sacs à revendre. C e financement lui permettra de renforcer son activité.
texts.en: Fatou is a young married woman, age 31.  She lives in Senegal and has a 5-year-old child.  She has been involved in business and in the sale of bags for two years.  She chose this activity out of necessity and so that she would not be idle.  She has been a member of one of the local UIMCEC branches for two years.  She is requesting a loan of 100,000 francs which will be used to buy bags for resale.  This loan will allow her to strengthen her activity.

loans.use: to buy bags for resale.

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es: Tomasa  se dedica con mayor ahinco a la comercialización de artículos de plata, porque con ella le va muy bien; su negocio de tradición familiar por parte de su esposo  le sigue  pareciendo mas rentable y entre ella y su esposo, han logrado sacarlo adelante y con ello brindar educación y bienestar general a sus hijos. Esto es lo que a Tomasa  la llena de satisfacción porque ha podido contribuir con sus ingresos al buen desempeño de su familia. Tomasa está vinculada a la Fundación desde hace 2 años en los cuales ha recibido un crédito con el que  ha comprado vitrinas e hizo adecuaciones a su vivienda. Su meta más adelante es tener un local propio, para mejorar el servicio de sus clientes. En la actualidad está aplicando a su credikiva, tercer financiamiento con la Fundación, con el cual comprará cadenas, aretes, anillos, tobilleras, que son los artículos de plata con más aceptación en el mercado y con ellos responderá a pedidos, lo cual hacen que su inversión sea exitosa. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es : Muchas gracias a mis  financiadores de Kiva porque me han dado la oportunidad de trabajar comodamente y cubrir las necesidades y gustos de los clientes".
texts.en:
Tomasa is working harder selling silver articles, because it's going very well. Her business, a family tradition of her husband's, still seems to be very profitable. 

Between her and her husband, she has managed to keep it going, and with it provide for the education and general well-being of her children. This is what fills Tomasa with satisfaction; because with her income, she has been able to contribute to her family's success.

Tomasa has been associated with the Foundation for two years. During this time she received a loan with which she bought display cases, and did home improvements. Her goal for the future is to have her own shop, in order to improve service to her customers.

Now she is applying for her credikiva, her third loan with the Foundation, with which she will buy chains, earrings, rings, and ankle bracelets. These are the most popular silver articles in the market, and with these she will respond to orders, ensuring the success of her investment.

Her message to Kiva lenders is: "Many thanks to my Kiva lenders, because you have given me the chance to work conveniently and meet the customers' needs and tastes.

loans.use: To buy chains, earrings, rings, and ankle bracelets.

loans.name: Diego

texts.en: Diego is the owner of “Plaza +Son Trucking”, a Rhode Island-based business.  Hailing from Columbia, Diego decided to start his business to fulfill his dream of working independently. Diego finds joy in setting his own hours and relying on himself, especially in a tough economy. Hoping to one day save enough capital to assist in paying his children’s college tuition, Diego continues to work hard to increase his weekly earnings.   Diego was grateful that he found the equipment for his business - a commercial truck - in less time than he imagined.  To move his business forward, Diego needs a loan to purchase a trailer for his truck. With a loan, Diego will be able to cover the cost of this purchase.

loans.use: To purchase a trailer for his truck

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 40 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. 

Ruth has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for PHP 15,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.

Ruth has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Ruth hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Burhon

texts.ru: Бурхон проживает в городе Вахдат. Ему 32 года. Он женат. У него двое детей. Бурхон имеет среднее образование. Он занимается торговлей продуктов питания. Этим видом бизнеса занимается шест лет. Он берет кредит для увеличения товарооборота.
texts.en: Burhon lives in the city of Vahdat.  He is 32 years old, married and has two children.  Burhon has a secondary education.  He is involved in selling food products.  He has been in this business for six year.  He is requesting this loan to increase product turnover.

loans.use: to purchase confectionery goods and perfumery

loans.name: Firuz

texts.ru: Фируз проживает в районе Файзабад. Возраст, 30 лет. Женат. Имеет троих детей. Его дети учатся в средней школе. Сам Фируз имеет среднее образование. Он занимается торговлей конфет. Кредит берет для увеличения товарооборота.
texts.en: Firuz lives in the Fayzabad district.  He is 30 years old, married and has three children.  His children attend a secondary school.  Firuz has a secondary education.  He is involved in selling candy.  He is requesting this loan to increase product turnover.

loans.use: to purchase candy, chocolate and waffles

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en:
Sharon is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. 

Sharon has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for PHP 14,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.

Sharon has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Sharon hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages for sell

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is 40 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. Elisa has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for 15 years. 

Elisa has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Elisa hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 49 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with five children. Ruth provides services using a motorcycle with sidecar with her husband as the driver. She has had this business for 10 years. 

Ruth has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the service. She has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Ruth hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the service

loans.name: Wenrissa

texts.en:
Wenrissa is 24 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with one child. Wenrissa has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for two years. 

Wenrissa has requested a loan of 9,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Wenrissa hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell

loans.name: Maycil

texts.en:
Maycil is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children. Maycil has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for 10 years. 

Maycil has requested a loan of 9,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Maycil hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell

loans.name: Nieves

texts.en:
Nieves is 51 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is widowed with 8 children. 
Nieves has a retail shop where she sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 3 years. She requested a loan of 11,000 to buy stock for her shop.
Nieves has been a member of HSPFI since 2009. In the future, Nieves hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Gelly

texts.en:
Gelly is 36 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. Gelly has a food shop that sells snacks like rice cakes, sweet potato and banana cue (a popular snack). She has had this business for five years. 

Gelly has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy bananas which are needed for making banana cue. She has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Gelly hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy bananas which are needed for making banana cue

loans.name: Gerson

texts.en:
Gerson is 50 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 4 children. 
Gerson has a shop that sells charcoal by the sack. He has had this business for 4 years. He requested a loan of 10,000 to buy wood & materials needed for making charcoal.
Gerson has been a member of HSPFI since 2009. In the future, Gerson hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy wood & materials needed for making charcoal

loans.name: Eric

texts.en:
Eric is 34 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 3 children. 
Eric provides motorela or motorcycle services. He has had this business for 5 years. He requested a loan of 15,000 to buy tools & to pay for gasoline for his business.
Eric has been a member of HSPFI since 2007. In the future, Eric hopes to improve his services.

loans.use: to buy tools & pay for gasoline

loans.name: Ella

texts.en:
Ella is 20 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single. Ella has a shop that sells chicken and pork barbecues every afternoon on the sidewalk. She has had this business for a year. 

Ella has requested a loan of 9,000 PHP to buy raw ingredients for preparing barbecue food for sale. She has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Ella hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for preparing barbecue food for sale

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa is 51 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. Marissa has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for 15 years. 

Marissa has requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Marissa hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 34 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 4 children. 
Josephine has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 4 years. She requested a loan of 14,000 to buy stock for her shop.
Josephine has been a member of HSPFI since 2010. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: George

texts.en: George is a 34-year-old married man with two children living in Masindi, Uganda. He is a market vendor who sells shoes and stockings for children. His challenge is the scorching sun since his only shelter is a small umbrella and his dream is to move to more permanent business premises. George needs the loan facility to buy shoes and stockings to sell.

loans.use: to buy shoes and stockings to sell.

loans.name: Paul
